predicate.note: Frames file for 'broker' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to arrange or manage as a broker

example.name: all arguments
example.text: However , even this admirable plan could become objectionable if the White House gives in to congressional Democratic pressure [*] to add to the scope of the president 's initiative or [*] to involve the independent foundation in [*] `` brokering '' federal funds for volunteer projects .
